meanings.definition: To show the way to someone by leading or directing them.
meanings.sent1: She will guide you through the forest.
meanings.sent2: He guides tourists around the city.
meanings.sent3: The robot guide led the group with its bright light.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom will guide you like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The stars above guide sailors safely home.

meanings.definition: A person who shows the way to others.
meanings.sent1: The guide pointed out the landmarks.
meanings.sent2: The mountain guide led the climbers to the summit.
meanings.sent3: The friendly guide made the tour enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: She was a guide in both knowledge and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The guide's knowledge was as vast as the ocean.

meanings.definition: A book or manual that provides information or instructions on a particular subject.
meanings.sent1: The travel guide listed all the attractions.
meanings.sent2: The user guide helped set up the new device.
meanings.sent3: The cooking guide made the recipe seem easy.
meanings.sent4: His words were a guide through the complex topic.
meanings.sent5: The guidebook was a treasure trove of knowledge.
